root.name: Suikoden IV
root.description: Story Suikoden IV tells the story of young man growing up on the island of Razril and how he came into possession of the Rune of Punishment, one of the 27 True Runes. The player assumes the role of this young boy as they attempt to recruit all 108 stars of destiny and raise an army capable of stopping the oppressive Kooluk empire from taking over the once peaceful Island Nations. Gameplay The gameplay in Suikoden IV is largely the same as it has always been in the Suikoden titles. The player travels the world fighting monsters and recruiting allies all the while building up their base of operations(this time a large boat.) The battle system is changed slightly from the previous games, this time only allowing 4 party members in combat at a time. Another change to the formula is the addition of ship battles, a form of boat vs. boat combat on the open sea that plays out like a simple Rock, Paper, Scissors style RTS game.Soundtrack The Suikoden IV original soundtrack was composed and arranged by Masahiko Kimura, Norikazu Miura, Michiru Yamane, and coba . It was released as a 2 CD set in Japan on June1st, 2005. Tracklist: Disc One01 - La Mer02 - A New Journey ~Opening Theme~ (Name Entry BGM)03 - Departure (Opening Staff Roll BGM)04 - Arrival (Razril BGM)05 - Battle Entry 1 (Battle Entry Jingle 1)06 - Battle (Normal Battle BGM)07 - Victory Theme (Battle Results Display BGM)08 - Life of a Knight (Razril Knights BGM)09 - Festive Night (Razril BGM: Festival Event)10 - Gloomy Sailing (World Map BGM: Small Ship)11 - Rollback (Tension BGM 1)12 - Warfare on the Vast Expanse of the Sea 1 (Naval Battle BGM 1)13 - On a Quiet Island (Deserted Island BGM)14 - The Conversation Continues (Event Conversation BGM 2)15 - Night on the Deserted Island (Deserted Island BGM: Nighttime)16 - Echoes of the Sea's Roar (Deserted Island BGM: Cave)17 - Battle Entry 2 (Battle Entry Jingle 2)18 - A Formidable Enemy Arrives (Midboss Battle BGM)19 - Crossing the Waves (World Map BGM: First Half of the Story)20 - Theme of Ajit (Pirate Island BGM)21 - A Certain Meeting (Eleanor's Hermitage BGM)22 - Southern Wind (Kingdom of Obel BGM)23 - Significance of Heritage (Kingdom of Obel: Palace BGM)24 - Time Stands Still (Kingdom of Obel: Ruins BGM)25 - Stronghold 1 (Stronghold BGM: First Half of the Story)26 - Orange Colored Scenery (Middleport BGM)27 - Reinbach Theme28 - A Dear Person (Event Conversation 1)29 - Concealed Offense and Defense (Middleport BGM: Underground Dungeon)30 - Monochrome Episode (Iluya Island BGM)31 - Monochrome Episode ~Amidst the Rubble~ (Iluya Island BGM: Destroyed Town)32 - Start Up (Minigame Explanation BGM)33 - Depth in Simplicity (Minigame BGM: Coin Game)34 - Keep Going!
